title: Salutem & officia in Christo Jesu. Good brother, Finding my self obliged by his Majesty's most gracious letters patents, for the relief of the French that have lately taken refuge in this kingdom to give a particular recommendation to the clergy of my diocese, for the advancement of so pious and charitable work, ...
author: Church of England. Diocese of Ely. Bishop (1684-1690 : Turner)
